title: instrument made under an Act and relating to any administration and business
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Global Valuation (Transfer of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Global Valuation (Transfer of 

Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2024. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 1 March 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited global valuation (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2024 (2) order shall come operation 1 march 2024

title: instrument made under an Act and relating to any administration and business
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of the functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

(2) References to the Department of Justice contained in any Act or any 
instrument made under an Act and relating to any administration and business 
transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Department of Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department housing local government heritage (2) reference department justice contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department housing local government heritage

title: instrument made under an Act and relating to any administration and business
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Justice by or under section
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Justice by or under section 
53 of the Valuation Act 2001 (No. 13 of 2001) are transferred to the Minister 
for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

(2) References to the Minister for Justice contained in any Act or 
instrument made under an Act and relating to any functions transferred by this 
Article shall, from the commencement of this Order, be construed as references 
to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister justice section 53 valuation act 2001 (no 13 2001) transferred minister housing local government heritage (2) reference minister justice contained act instrument made act relating function transferred article shall commencement order construed reference minister housing local government heritage

title: instrument made under an Act and relating to any administration and business
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Justice is a party and the 
proceedings have reference to functions transferred by this Order to the 
Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage, the name of the 
Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage shall, in so far as the 
proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, be substituted in 
the proceedings for that of the Minister for Justice or added in the proceedings, 
as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by reason of such 
substitution.
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister justice party proceeding reference function transferred order minister housing local government heritage name minister housing local government heritage shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding minister justice added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution

title: instrument made under an Act and relating to any administration and business
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Justice may, in so far as it relates to 
functions transferred by this Order to the Minister for Housing, Local

Government and Heritage, be carried on or completed

title: instrument made under an Act and relating to any administration and business
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made 
in the performance of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far 
as it was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have 
effect from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the 
Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister housing local government heritage

title: instrument made under an Act and relating to any administration and business
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Justice contained in the memorandum
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Justice contained in the memorandum 
and articles of association of any company and relating to any function 
transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage.
text_norm: 7 reference minister justice contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister housing local government heritage

title: instrument made under an Act and relating to any administration and business
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before 
the commencement of this Order by the Minister for Justice in connection with 
the functions transferred by this Order are transferred to the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage and, accordingly, without any 
further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on such commencement - 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage by this Article which, on the 
commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for 
Justice shall, on the request of the Minister for Housing, Local Government 
and Heritage, be transferred into the name of the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
 of the Government, 
27 February, 2024. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach.
